original: @432b rgya gar skad du /🔽a'arya sarba @433a *//
analyzed: @432b rgya gar skad du / a'arya sarba @433a *//
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aanta ra sam gra sa dh'a ra ni mantra /
analyzed: aanta ra sam gra sa dh'a ra ni mantra /
translated: Ārya-sarva-antarāya-śodhana-dhāraṇī-mantra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags /
analyzed: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags /
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī Mantra That Removes All Obstacles

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi:

original: phyag na rdo rje /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje /
translated: Vajrapāṇi,

original: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni /
analyzed: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni /
translated: for whoever holds, upholds, and recites this dhāraṇī mantra,

original: dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang /
analyzed: dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang /
translated: there will be no death by poison, weapons, starvation, being struck by weapons, being eaten by vicious beasts, being burned by fire, drowning, contagious fevers, leprosy,

original: gsor mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang / g-yang la lhung ba dang gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsor mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang / g-yang la lhung ba dang gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: 4. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to help,🔽5. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to protect,🔽6. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to rescue,🔽7. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to save,🔽8. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to comfort,🔽9. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to give refuge,🔽10. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to give protection,🔽11. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to give shelter,🔽12. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to give relief,🔽13. being in a place where there is no one who knows how to give rescue.🔽Vajrapāṇi,

original: phyag na rdo rje /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje /
translated: for whoever holds,

original: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni /
analyzed: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni /
translated: recites, and practices this dhāraṇī,

original: sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: even the wicked and arrogant obstructors who dwell on the earth and in the sky will not find an opportunity.🔽Vajrapāṇi,

original: phyag na rdo rje /
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje /
translated: for whoever holds,

original: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / @433b nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang shing dag ste /
analyzed: gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang / @433b nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang shing dag ste /
translated: recites, and practices this dhāraṇī, all karmic obscurations, afflictive obscurations, and cognitive obscurations will be purified and cleansed,

original: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will be reborn in the world of Sukhāvatī.

original: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa hūṃ phaṭ

original: aa pra ti ha ta ba la h'um phat/
analyzed: aa pra ti ha ta ba la h'um phat/
translated: Apratīhata bala hūṃ phaṭ

original: sarba bighnam aanta ra ya bi n'a sha ka ra m'a ra ya h'um phat/
analyzed: sarba bighnam aanta ra ya bi n'a sha ka ra m'a ra ya h'um phat/
translated: Sarva vighanāntarāya vināśaka mara ya hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces brgya rtsa brjod na 'grub bo //
analyzed: ces brgya rtsa brjod na 'grub bo //
translated: If you recite this one hundred times, you will succeed.

original: nges par 'grub bo //
analyzed: nges par 'grub bo //
translated: It is definitely successful.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble dhāraṇī that removes all obstacles is complete.
